results.title: First still of Black Hole
results.brief_description: The Event Horizon Telescope—a planet-scale array of ground-based radio telescopes—has obtained the first image of a supermassive black hole and its shadow. The image, taken in 2019, reveals the central black hole of Messier 87, a massive galaxy in the Virgo cluster.

constellations_other.name: Space, sci-fi and cinema fakes
constellations_other.description: Magic lantern slides were used to entertain and educate audiences in home, theatres and universities. While performers told jokes and fairytales, travelling showmen unveiled exotic locations and scientists revealed the latest discoveries.

constellations_other.name: A brief history of black holes on-screen
constellations_other.description: In 1916, Albert Einstein predicted black holes through his theory of general relativity. That mix of science and imagination can be seen in Marshmallow Laser Feast’s Distortions in Spacetime. These other works are fascinated by these cosmic giants and represent an evolution in computer graphics and VFX.

results.description: The Event Horizon Telescope—a planet-scale array of ground-based radio telescopes—has obtained the first image of a supermassive black hole and its shadow. The image, taken in 2019, reveals the central black hole of Messier 87, a massive galaxy in the Virgo cluster. – National Geographic

results.title: First steps to sharemarket investment
results.brief_description: This video is aimed, primarily, at those people interested in making their first move into the world of investment. In it, Susan Manson, B.Ec., Education Officer for the Australian Stock Exchange, Melbourne, takes you step by step through all the aspects of equity investments. In short, everything you ever wanted to know to become a knowledgeable participant in the market.

results.title: First steps
results.creator_credit: Leo Seltzer and Frederic House Inc for the Department of Social Affairs of the United Nations
results.brief_description: Deals with the treatment and care of children crippled by cerebral palsy and poliomyelitis. The program of treatment is designed to integrate children into society. Demonstrates how training and practice in the handling of toys and hobby materials can be transformed into handling of tools and utensils necesary for everyday life. Photographed in a summer camp, the film ends as a small boy leaves his parents to take his first steps on a crowded city street. Academy Award winner for best short documentary 1947. Narrated by Winston O’Keefe.

results.title: First Screening: Computer Poems
results.brief_description: A suite of a dozen kinetic poems programmed in Apple BASIC. Later, as the first versions became inaccessible, the works were recreated in HyperCard in the early 1990s (after bpNichol’s death), and then in 2007 recreated in javascript for the web, and simultaneously the original BASIC and Hypercard files were republished for download.

constellations_other.name: Pen names, poems and puppets
constellations_other.description: Discover how big-screen adaptations of novels connect to web-based poetry and Jim Henson's Fraggle Rock.

results.title: First principles of editing
results.creator_credit: Lynn John, John A. Givins and KTV Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode number 12 of Series “Video tech”.
Focuses on basic editing principles - making the decision about what to include in a video story and what to omit. Investigates the reasons it is essential to edit - to eliminate unwanted footage, to compress time and to ultimately make a program more interesting. It also looks at the needs of in-camera editing such as planning a shoot, shooting in sequence and shot duration. It also covers the needs of editing between camcorder and VCR, setting up at home and crash editing.

results.title: First mate
results.creator_credit: Jane Karslake and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
results.brief_description: Clarrie and Lex are mutually supportive old mates. However, the onset of senility threatens and finally destroys their independence. Good performances and sensitive portrayal of problems of aged men.

results.title: First it seemed kinda strange
results.brief_description: Les’s parents divorced five years ago and he then went to live with his mother. He visits his father and stepmother on weekends and vacations and seems to have adjusted to this arrangement. This film raises issues surrounding social awareness and self awareness; divorce; family roles and relationships; and communication. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.

results.title: First impressions
results.brief_description: This film is designed for use in training supervisors and junior managers in human relations problems. The film tells the story of two workers starting with a new firm. Both are looking forward to the work and believe that they now have the opportunity they have been looking for to make successful careers for themselves. The first part shows how frustration and disillusionment can arise through lack of care and thought on the part of the supervisor. It then shows how these bad impressions could have been avoided by proper handling of the situation.
